Notes.Text:
This update for poppler fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2025-43903: improper verification of adbe.pkcs7.sha1 signatures allows for signature forgeries. (bsc#1241620)
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: NSSCryptoSignBackend.cc in Poppler before 25.04.0 does not verify the adbe.pkcs7.sha1 signatures on documents, resulting in potential signature forgeries.
